text: Aloha everybody—we’re launching our annual Most Contagious report today in anticipation of a big event we’re hosting in London next week. The report is pretty fun, it’s our year-end roundup of interesting areas we’ve been keeping eyes on. There are physical copies on the table by the kitchen—feel free to take one!—and you can download the digital version at <http://2015.mostcontagious.com|2015.mostcontagious.com>.
